tokens.t:
δύνα<subst>
                <del rend="overstrike">
                    <choice>
                        <unclear reason="other" unit="character" atLeast="2" atMost="3"/>
                        <supplied cert="high">μιν</supplied>
                    </choice>
                </del>
                <add hand="corr1" place="inline">μυ</add>
            </subst>
